english_example_sentence: You supposedly told this interesting story to your friends yesterday.
russian_example_sentence: Вы якобы рассказали эту интересную историю своим друзьям вчера.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, dün arkadaşlara bu ilginç hikayeyi anlatmışsınız.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz, dün arkadaşlara bu ilginç hikayeyi ______.
